name: Le Bambole 3-seater Modular Sofa by Mario Bellni for B&B Italia, 1970s

condition.details: Reupholstered. Wear consistent with age and use. Signs of use on the bottoms.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Le Bambole sectional sofa, Mario Bellini, honey color wool, B&B Italia The Le Bambole is an iconic piece of Italian design. It was awarded the 1979 'Compasso d'Oro' award. An example of Le Bambole is included in MoMA's permanent collection. It's well known to provide extreme comfort. Different settings are possible. Repholstered in the luxurious Pierre Frey Toundra wool velvet. We provide leather laces to connect the sections so they don't slide.
